docs.text: Images Gets the images for the champions, traits and items in the set. Usage /{set}/imgs Queries Query Description champion The champion to get the icon for. item The item to get the icon for (can be name or id). trait The trait to get the icon for. Responses Code Description 200 Success response 404 Error response Examples /set6.5/imgs { "status": 404, "type": "images", "message": "No champion, trait, or item specified" } Champion: /set6.5/imgs?champion=silco /set6.5/imgs?champion=test { "status": 404, "type": "champion", "message": "test is not the name of any champion" } Item: /set6.5/imgs?item=306 /set6.5/imgs?item=Manazane /set6.5/imgs?item=test { "status": 404, "type": "item", "message": "test is not the id or name of any item" } Trait: /set6.5/imgs?trait=debonair /set6.5/imgs?trait=test { "status": 404, "type": "trait", "message": "test is not the name of any trait" }

docs.text: Items Gets information about champion units in the game. Usage /{set}/items Queries Query Description id The id of the item. name The name of the item. attr Attributes of the item (these can be specific to a set). Set Attributes All Sets Attribute Description unique The item is unique (one per champion). elusive Cannot be crafted. Set 6 Attribute Description artifact The item is an artifact. Set 6.5 Attribute Description artifact The item is an artifact. radiant The item is radiant. Responses Code Description 200 Success response 404 Error response Examples Base: /set6.5/items [ { "id": 1, "name": "B.F. This effect does not stack.", "isUnique": true, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Critical Strike Chance", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2035, "name": "Locket of the Targon Prime", "description": "When combat begins, the holder and nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks damage for several seconds.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2037, "name": "More More-ellonomicon", "description": "When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing for the duration of the burn.", "isUnique": true, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Starting Mana", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2069, "name": "Quickestsilver", "description": "The holder gains immunity to crowd control in combat for several seconds.", "isUnique": true, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Attack Speed", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2033, "name": "Rabadon's Ascended Deathcap", "description": "Grants bonus Ability Power (including components).", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2022, "name": "Rapid Lightcannon", "description": "Increases the holder's Attack Range and grants bonus Attack Speed (including components). The holder's attacks can no longer miss.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Attack Speed", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2047, "name": "Radiant Redemption", "description": "Periodically, the holder radiates an aura to nearby allies, healing them a percentage of their missing Health. Affected allies take reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for several seconds.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Health", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2026, "name": "Runaan's Tempest", "description": "The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing a percentage of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Attack Speed", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2059, "name": "Shroud of Reverence", "description": "When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana until they cast.", "isUnique": true, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Starting Mana for all allies at the start of combat", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2014, "name": "Spear of Hirana", "description": "The holder's Basic Attacks restore additional Mana.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2024, "name": "Statikk Favor", "description": "Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist for several seconds.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2057, "name": "Sunlight Cape", "description": "Periodically, a random nearby enemy is burned a percentage of their maximum Health over several seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced.", "isUnique": true, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Regenerate percentage max Health per second", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2099, "name": "Rascal's Gloves", "description": "At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary Radiant items. [Consumes Three Item Slots]", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2025, "name": "Titan's Vow", "description": "When the holder takes damage or inflicts a critical strike, they gain a stacking Attack Damage and Ability Power bonus. This stacks up to a limit, at which point the holder gains Armor and Magic Resistance.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2079, "name": "Banshee's Silence", "description": "When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Health for all allies at the start of combat", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2077, "name": "Warmog's Pride", "description": "Grants bonus Health (including components).", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Regenerate percentage max Health per second", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2017, "name": "Zeke's Harmony", "description": "When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Attack Speed and Lifesteal for the rest of combat.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2067, "name": "Mistral", "description": "When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds. Ignores CC immunity.", "isUnique": true, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "radiantBonus": "Attack Speed for all allies at the start of combat", "isArtifact": false }, { "id": 2027, "name": "Zz'Rot Invitation", "description": "At the start of combat, a Radiant Voidmother with bonus Health and Attack Damage aries and taunts nearby enemies. Radiant Voidmothers that arise from summoned units are only partially effective.", "isUnique": false, "isElusive": false, "isRadiant": true, "isArtifact": false } ]

docs.text: Traits Gets information about champion units in the game. Usage /{set}/traits Queries Query Description name The name of the trait. type Type of a trait (class or origin). Responses Code Description 200 Success response 404 Error response Examples Base: /set6.5/traits [ { "key": "Set6-5_Arcanist", "name": "Arcanist", "description": "Allies have increased Spell Power.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "silver", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 6, "max": 7 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 8 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Assassin", "name": "Assassin", "description": "Innate. Assassins jump to the enemy backline at the start of combat. Assassins' Abilities can critically strike, and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 6 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Bodyguard", "name": "Bodyguard", "description": "Bodyguards have increased Armor. Shortly after combat begins, Bodyguards taunt adjacent enemies.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "silver", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 6, "max": 7 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 8 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Bruiser", "name": "Bruiser", "description": "All allies have increased Health. Bruisers gain double this bonus.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "silver", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 6, "max": 7 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 8 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Challenger", "name": "Challenger", "description": "Challengers have increased Attack Speed. Upon landing a takedown on their target, challengers will dash to a new target, doubling this bonus for 2.5 seconds.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "silver", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 6, "max": 7 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 8 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Chemtech", "name": "Chemtech", "description": "After dropping below 60% Health, Chemtech champions gain 25% Damage Reduction, 50% Attack Speed, and regenerate 5% of their maximum Health each second. Breakpoints add to the duration of this effect.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 3, "max": 4 }, { "style": "silver", "min": 5, "max": 6 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 7, "max": 8 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 9 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Colossus", "name": "Colossus", "description": "Innate: Colossus are bigger, more powerful, and take up two slots in your army. (1) Colossus are immune to Crowd Control effects. (2) Colossus take reduced damage.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "gold", "min": 2 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Clockwork", "name": "Clockwork", "description": "All allies have increased Attack Speed, and additional Attack Speed for each Hextech Augment you own.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 6 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Debonair", "name": "Debonair", "description": "Debonair champions gain bonus Health and Ability Power. If there is a Debonair VIP in play, they activate their unique bonus. (Sell the old VIP for a chance to see a new one in your Shop.)", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 3, "max": 4 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 5, "max": 6 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 7 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Enchanter", "name": "Enchanter", "description": "Enchanters' healing and shielding are stronger, and all Allies gain increased Magic Resistance.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 2 }, { "style": "silver", "min": 3, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4, "max": 4 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 5 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Enforcer", "name": "Enforcer", "description": "Enforcers detain enemies at the start of combat for 4 seconds, temporarily removing them from combat.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "silver", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Glutton", "name": "Glutton", "description": "Once per planning phase, you can feed a unit to Tahm Kench. This unit is consumed, granting permanent bonus stats. The more valuable the unit, the bigger the bonus. To feed Tahm Kench, hover a unit over him until his mouth opens, then release. Bonuses: Bodyguard (Armor), Enchanter (Magic Resist), Bruisers/Protector (Health), other (Ability Power)", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "gold", "min": 1 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Hextech", "name": "Hextech", "description": "At the start of combat and every few seconds, the Hexcore sends out a pulse that grants a shield for Hextech champions that, while active, adds bonus magic damage on attacks.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "silver", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 6, "max": 7 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 8 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Innovator", "name": "Innovator", "description": "Innovators build a mechanical companion to join their battle.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 3, "max": 4 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 5, "max": 6 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 7 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Mastermind", "name": "Mastermind", "description": "At the start of combat, the Mastermind grants the 2 allies directly in front of him Mana.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "gold", "min": 1 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Mercenary", "name": "Mercenary", "description": "Gain a treasure chest that opens when you win combat against a player. At the start of each planning phase, roll the dice to add more loot to the chest! The longer you've gone without opening the chest, the luckier the dice. (3) Roll two dice. (5) Roll a third dice that grants you a bonus orb right away.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 3, "max": 4 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 5, "max": 6 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 7 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Mutant", "name": "Mutant", "description": "Mutants gain unique bonuses. These are different each game.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 3, "max": 4 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 5, "max": 6 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 7 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Rivals", "name": "Rivals", "description": "This trait is active when you have eaxtly 1 unique Rival unit, as Rivals refuse to work together. Vi's Mana cost is reduced. Jinx gains Attack Speed for 3 seconds after scoring a takedown.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "gold", "min": 1 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Scholar", "name": "Scholar", "description": "All allies restore some mana every 2 seconds.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 6 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Scrap", "name": "Scrap", "description": "At the start of combat, a number of incomplete components on Scrap champions turn into an ephemeral full item for that combat. Additionally, at the start of combat, Scrap champions also gain a Health shield for each item equipped in your army.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 6 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Sniper", "name": "Sniper", "description": "Snipers deal bonus damage for each hex between themselves and their target.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 6 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Socialite", "name": "Socialite", "description": "Socialite reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The unit standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses. (1) Bonus Damage (2) Bonus Mana Regen (3) Bonus Omnivamp", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 1, "max": 1 }, { "style": "silver", "min": 2, "max": 2 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 3, "max": 4 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 5 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Striker", "name": "Striker", "description": "Strikers gain bonus Attack Damage.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 6 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Syndicate", "name": "Syndicate", "description": "Chosen allies are cloaked in shadows, gaining Omnivamp, Armor, and Magic Resistance.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 3, "max": 4 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 5, "max": 6 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 7 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Transformer", "name": "Transformer", "description": "Transformers have two forms that they can swap in between during planning phase depending on whether they are placed in the frontline or backline.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "gold", "min": 1 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Twinshot", "name": "Twinshot", "description": "Twinshots gain bonus Attack Damage. When a Twinshot attacks, they have a chance to attack twice instead.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 6 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Yordle", "name": "Yordle", "description": "After combat with a player, a random free Yordle appears on your bench!", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 3, "max": 5 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 6 } ] }, { "key": "Set6-5_Yordle-Lord", "name": "Yordle-Lord", "description": "Benefits from the Yordle trait.", "type": "origin", "sets": [ { "style": "chromatic", "min": 1 } ] } ] Name: /set6.5/traits?name=sniper { "key": "Set6-5_Sniper", "name": "Sniper", "description": "Snipers deal bonus damage for each hex between themselves and their target.", "type": "class", "sets": [ { "style": "bronze", "min": 2, "max": 3 }, { "style": "gold", "min": 4, "max": 5 }, { "style": "chromatic", "min": 6 } ] } /set6.5/traits?name=test { "status": 404, "type": "trait", "message": "test is not the name of any trait" } Type: /set6.5/items?type=origin [ { "key": "Set6-5_Bodyguard", "name": "Bodyguard", "description": "Bodyguards have increased Armor.
